meta.content: Building a Better Tomorrow One Student at a Time

body.class: home page-template-default page page-id-1257 wp-custom-logo content sidebar_vertical_border site-full-width menu_sidebar_slide_left

div.p: 835 5th ST E. Saint Paul, MN 55106 | t: 651-289-6120
Building a Better Tomorrow One Student at a Time

nav.class: site-navigation primary-menu primary-menu-main nav-menu-desktop primary-menu-desktop style-plain

a.span: Healthy Students Make a Healthy School

div.p: Building a Better Tomorrow One Student at a Time
835 5th ST E. Saint Paul, MN 55106 | t: 651-289-6120

nav.class: site-navigation primary-menu primary-menu-sidebar nav-menu-mobile primary-menu-mobile style-plain

a.span: Healthy Students Make a Healthy School

div.p:
Welcome to Distance Learning! While student are learning at home, STEP Academy has limited staff on site to answer the phone, to prepare and deliver meals, and to provide general support for families. The administration, teachers, and staff have extensively prepared for this new experience (STEP Academy Distance Learning Plan).
STEP Academy is conducting its 2020-2021 school year lottery on April 1st. Please visit our enrollment page for more information.
Here are resources for Elementary Level Distance Learning.
Here are resources for Secondary Level Distance Learning.

div.class: n2-ss-widget n2-ss-widget-display-desktop n2-ss-widget-display-tablet n2-ss-widget-display-mobile nextend-arrow n2-ow nextend-arrow-previous nextend-arrow-animated-fade n2-ib
n2-ss-widget n2-ss-widget-display-desktop n2-ss-widget-display-tablet n2-ss-widget-display-mobile nextend-arrow n2-ow nextend-arrow-next nextend-arrow-animated-fade n2-ib

div.p: Science, Technology, Engineering, and Math. STEP Academy teaches students the skills they need for today’s careers.

College and Career Readiness (CCR) prepares students for college and career readiness and success. Students participate in activities that incorporate strategies focused on writing, inquiry, collaboration, organization, and reading to support their academic growth.
Students have the option to enroll in college programs while still at STEP Academy through PSEO. Learning the skills needed to be successful in college through CCR.
Due to the COVID-19 restrictions, STEP Academy is no longer offering school tours. Please call the office for firsthand information about the school.

hr.p: STEP Academy will empower students to use their personal attributes and acquired knowledge to lead productive lives and become contributing members of the global community.
Unique services designed for our students.

div.p: Each classroom has a chromebook for every student to enhance learning
Over 50% of juniors/seniors enrolled in PSEO classes
Additional staff, training, and curriculum to support students learning English.
Students build relationships throughout school
100% graduation rate 2016-17
Average class size of 20 students
We’re part of a MN positive behavior cohort (PBIS)
K-12 integration of STEM principles

figure.class: wp-block-embed-youtube wp-block-embed is-type-video is-provider-youtube wp-embed-aspect-16-9 wp-has-aspect-ratio

li.a: Congratulations to STEP Academy’s First Admitted Harvard Applicants

hr.p: MN STEP Academy is a K-12 Charter School in St. Paul, MN.

It is our vision to promote college-readiness by ensuring that all students are motivated to academic excellence, can qualify to obtain college credit while in high school, are fully prepared to enter college and graduate, with the critical knowledge and skills required for employment in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) careers.
As a public school open to all students, it also reaches out to students who are underserved by traditional schools and are underrepresented within STEM fields.

div.p:
6616 Brittany Road
Minneapolis, Minnesota 55434
STEP Academy will empower students to use their personal attributes and acquired knowledge to lead productive lives and become contributing members of the global community.
24 Hour Attendance: 651-289-6121

School Hours: 7:00am – 2:30pm
Office Hours: 6:30am – 4:00pm
